Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/emulators

What you'll find here: lets linux run programs from other operating systems

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

commodore/
emulators and tools for Commodore 64, 128, PET, and Amiga
dosemu/
various versions of the dos emulators
zx/
emulators for Sinclair ZX80/ZX81/Spectrum
68k-simulator.tar.gz 1995-02-18
MC-68000 Simulator for X-Windows (193699 bytes)
Flexemu-1.00.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-05-07
FLEX Operating system emulator with full graphics display (439764 bytes)
Sim8051_1.0.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-05-18
simulator for the 8051 microcontroller family (114943 bytes)
apple2-emul-0.7.3.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-01-25
Apple II+, //e emulator. Uses svgalib or X (250604 bytes)
bsod.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-01-08
the Blue Screen of Death for Linux (2496 bytes)
bsvc-2.1-src.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-11-09
Microprocessor Simulator (Motorola 68000) (629638 bytes)
cpm-0.2.1-glibc-rjm.patch.gz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1999-03-20
Z80 and CP/M emulator (6348 bytes)

Z80 and CP/M emulator (103797 bytes)

FLEX Operating system emulator with full graphics display (343869 bytes)

Sharp MZ700 emulator, uses SVGAlib (35321 bytes)
